AzureBlade:
So be it. Will I be responsible of your safety in case of hostility?

His tone was inquisitive, as he was not certain of his reaction should 
things get ugly...


>From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Awaiting
>Date: Sat, 11 Aug 2001 17:46:17 -0700
>
>
>* Iron Raptor sighed in the growing heat of the afternoon, finding that
>black wasn't exactly the best of colors to wear on a day like this but
>shoveed aside the heat and turned her face towards the sky once again.
>< I wish something would happen. This waiting is getting on my nerves.>
>A light but warm breeze stirred the fine grains of sand that were scattered
>over the ground, joined with the cold cinders of past plasma charges.
>Ruffling the black fabric which hung from her broad but plated shoulders.
>It hadn't been that long since the last battle and she could admit that she
>wasn't eager to see another...but with the wish that at least SOMETHING
>would happen couldn't help but be made.
>< Maybe after I'm through with the Maximals I can disappear into the
>holo-rooms for a while.>
>But who was she kidding?! It hadn't failed yet! Every time she tried to
>start something, something else just HAD to happen.
>< Oh well. One day.>*
>
>" We'll wait 20 more cycles for this guy to show, otherwise we'll head back
>into the city."
>
>* Iron spoke outloud so that AzureBlade would hear.*
>
>
